lead_paragraph: Distancing herself from President Barack Obama's foreign policy, potential 2016 U.S. presidential candidate Hillary Clinton said in an interview published on Sunday that the U.S. decision not to intervene early in the Syrian civil war was a "failure."

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Distances Herself From Obama's Foreign Policy
headline.print_headline: Hillary Clinton Distances Herself From Obama's Foreign Policy
